CustomField.description: If set to true, the contact will be included on all household greetings. This flag will automatically populate to true if the contact is the primary contact on a related account.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: If set to true, the contact will be included on all household greetings. This flag will automatically populate to true if the contact is the primary contact on a related account.
CustomField.label: Include in Household Greetings
